title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, create and delete models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; identical API surface to the JS client with sync & async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, RAG, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models written in Rust; supports themes, keybindings, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI and keybindings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server using the official JS client.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration allowing Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and persistent model storage.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package; 80k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python package; 200k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client for Ollama demonstrating HTTP streaming and arena allocators.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma in Docker Compose.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Community Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.
